Section.Catchline: Security interest unperfected before effective date.

SectionBody.Text: A security interest that is an unperfected security interest immediately before July 1, 2013, becomes a perfected security interest:

Subsection.Text: Without further action, on July 1, 2013, if the applicable requirements for perfection under this chapter, as amended by ch. 2012-59, Laws of Florida, are satisfied before or at that time; or
When the applicable requirements for perfection are satisfied if the requirements are satisfied after that time.
